review: I am not a tech guy, but I have been on the forefront of the various internet on demand boxes available over the last few years and the Fire TV is hands down, the absolute best! Finally, a product and company that takes the download, buffering and display of Internet content seriously. Way to go Amazon!  If you don't have your own Fire TV yet then you are missing out on what your HD TV can really do.
author: John Galt
